Introduction: On a fine evening, you are lying beside your sister while she is reading a long boring book.
Suddenly, a white rabbit with pink eyes and a long coat runs by you!
'Was that a rabbit wearing a coat!', you wonder.
Your cat Dinah also comes and runs by you going after the rabbit!!
You quickly go after the two to see what exactly is happening.
The rabbit goes into a rabbit hole and so does your cat, you quickly follow without thinking.
Instructions: To skip this tutorial, type 'skip' or 's'.

To move in any direction, simply type it e.g. 'Go North', 'Go South', 'Go Northwest', 'Go NW' e.t.c. 
		To see the map, type 'see map', 'show map' or simply 'map'

Movement is relative to your location, e.g. if you're in the South and you say 'go east',
		you'll be in the Southeast
		Unless you know this place very well, you'll want to grab a map when you see one

To collect an item, simply type 'collect'.
		To consume an item, you first need to collect it. Then, type 'drink bottle', 'eat mushroom', 'eat cake' e.t.c
		You can also drop an item you have collected. Type 'drop gem', 'drop map' e.t.c.

To check items you have, type 'show inventory', 'i' or 'show items'.
		To give an item, type 'give gem', 'give glove' e.t.c.
There is a Safe Room which stores one item. You can drop an item there and pick it up later.
If you do not wish to perform any action, simply press 'Enter'
To see these instructions anywhere, type 'instructions'
Tip: Always carry at least one item
Remember to have fun in Wonderland, Alice!
